titleStmt.title: Notable revolutions beeing a true relation of what hap'ned in the United Provinces of the Netherlands in the years MDCL and MDCLI somewhat before and after the death of the late Prince of Orange : according to the Dutch copie / collected and published at the Haghe 1652 by Lion Aitzema.
Herstelde leeuw. English
titleStmt.author: Aitzema, Lieuwe van, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: "The transaction of the union, everlasting league and agreement between the countries, provinces, cities and members thereof ... decreed at Utrecht ... Januarie 29, in the year M.D.LXXIX": p. [5-40]
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
